testers

Class AutomatedTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • testers.AutomatedTester

  • public class AutomatedTester
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the automated testing functionality. It does this by launching a thread for the Selendroid server driver and feeding it testing input and interactions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AutomatedTester(SelendroidServerDriver serverDriver, Tester tester)
      Creates an instance of AutomatedTester.

      void setWaitTime(int interval)
      Sets the wait time to be used.
      void singleTest()
      Overloaded, "default" singleTest method In this implementation of singleTest the serverDriver, waitTime, and tester fields of the AutomatedTester instance are used by default.
      void startTesting()
      Starts the testing thread.
      void stopTesting()
      Stops the testing thread.

      • AutomatedTester

        public AutomatedTester(SelendroidServerDriver serverDriver,
                       Tester tester)
        Creates an instance of AutomatedTester.
        Parameters:
        serverDriver - - a SelendroidServerDriver instance based on the APK to be tested
        tester - - a Tester instance representing the type of tester to be used (see the help guide for testing types)

    • Method Detail

      • startTesting

        public void startTesting()
        Starts the testing thread.

      • singleTest

        public void singleTest()
        Overloaded, "default" singleTest method In this implementation of singleTest the serverDriver, waitTime, and tester fields of the AutomatedTester instance are used by default.

      • stopTesting

        public void stopTesting()
        Stops the testing thread.

      • pauseInput

        public void pauseInput()
        Pauses the testing thread.

      • resumeInput

        public void resumeInput()
        Resumes the testing thread.

      • setWaitTime

        public void setWaitTime(int interval)
        Sets the wait time to be used. Users can specify an interval to be used in between testing commands being sent to the server driver either from within the GUI or via this method. This is useful in instances when a user might want to monitor more closely the actions taking place.
        Parameters:
        interval - - the wait time to be used in milliseconds as an int

        public void setTester(Tester newTester)
